name: VR - 3D Hotel Room Views
description:
Looking for a hotel for weekend, come here and see it so many 360 degree pictures of world class motel in Vr hotel Visit 3d. Vr hotel Visit 3d is a short guided tour of beautiful resorts in virtual reality.
It will let you real experience as you visiting in realty. Navigate your device around 360D to explore all in 360 degree images. You can easily visit many motels by this game in a beautiful way. Fully 3d models pictures of many resorts.

How to Play:
Press play Button.
Put your device into VR glasses.
Use revolving chair or stand in open place.
You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis.
Also visualize up/down view.
Follow the big white circle given on image to change image.

Features:
HD pictures.
360 degree rotation.
Stunning 3D Graphics.
No time Limit, unlimited play and fun.
Play it anytime, anywhere!
Various church.
360 images.
Nice graphics.
